https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/9JjU1tnnrgwpfmMICIcxEqUTFyw.jpg A young man is forced to pretend to be his estranged gay brother in order to keep a major business from falling through. Though he has always hated his brother, the young man gains a new appreciation as he lives his brother's life. Bromance: My Brother's Romance
